Sentencas: This paper investigated the Sr doping effect on the microstructure, chemical stability, and conductivity of Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-delta (0 <= x <= 0.2) electrolyte prepared by sol- gel method.
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The lattice constants and unit cell volumes were found to decrease as Sr atomic percentage increased in accordance with the Vegard law, confirming the formation of solid solution.
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Incorporation of Sr into the composition resulted in smaller grains besides suppressing the formation of secondary phases of SrCeO3.
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among the synthesized samples BaCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-delta pellet with orthorhombic structure showed highest conductivity with a value of 2.08 x 10(-3) S/cm(dry air) and 2.12 x 10(-3) S/cm (wet air with 3% relative humidity) at 500 degrees C due to its smaller lattice volume, larger grain size, and lower activation energy that led to excessive increase in conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ba0.8Sr0.2Ce0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-delta recorded lower conductivity with a value of 4.62 x 10(-4)
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: S/cm (dry air) and 4.83 x 10(-4) S/cm (wet air with 3% relative humidity) at 500 degrees C than Sr undoped but exhibited better chemical stability when exposed to air and H2O atmospheres.
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Comparisons with the literature showed the importance of the synthesis method on the properties of the powders.
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hence this composition can be a promising electrolyte if all the values such as sintering temperature, Sr dopant concentration, and time are proportionally controlled.
Titulo: Effect of strontium on Nd doped Ba1-xSrxCe0.65Zr0.25Nd0.1O3-δ proton conductor as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells
